name: Lock 'n' Roll Deluxe
description:
Lock 'n' Roll Deluxe is the ULTIMATE free puzzle game combining the strategy and luck. Now your down time just got a little bit more interesting and that boring solitaire has been replaced with this addictive game!
“It’s a far simpler game to play than it is to describe,” says PocketGamer so just download it now! There’s a reason LNR is the #1 iPhone dice game but if you want more info on the greatest puzzle dice game since Y@htzee, by all means proceed.
How to play the coolest free puzzle dice game and the best free app download:
Roll four dice at a time and arrange them on a 4x4 grid. Receive points for various combinations according to number and color.
You must place all four dice and once you lock them down, they are fixed in place! the most difficult combinations are cleared from the board.
